featureText: Yellowdig is an educational technology platform designed to enhance the learning experience through active, social, and experiential learning communities.

features.title: Connecting the Learning Experience
features.text: Yellowdig facilitates the creation of active and engaging learning communities, whether the educational program is conducted online, in a hybrid format, or in-person. By fostering social interactions and collaboration among students, Yellowdig aims to enhance the overall learning experience and promote deeper engagement with course materials.

features.title: Accessible and FERPA Compliant
features.text: Yellowdig prioritizes accessibility and compliance with regulations such as FERPA (Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act). This commitment ensures that student data and privacy are protected, allowing educational institutions to confidently integrate Yellowdig into their learning environments while meeting necessary regulatory requirements.

features.title: Driving Meaningful Outcomes
features.text: Yellowdig emphasizes the importance of driving meaningful results within learning communities. This includes focusing on learner retention and student persistence gains, which are crucial for institutional success. By promoting active participation, deeper learning, and reducing faculty workload through streamlined grading processes, Yellowdig aims to contribute to positive educational outcomes and student satisfaction.
